channel.title: Looking for help/tut on getting a server up
channel.description:
[b]Just to let you know I've read the 'ultimate server guide' twice and tried what he recommended but these are the problems I am having after not finding out how to fix them checking his guide over and over.[/b]
Ok a few problems im having, I used - http://ascape.bounceme.net/portcheck.php, to check if my router was set up properly but obviously not so I need help for setting up the port forwarding with a puretek pt-3812 router please (I used this to do it but it didnt work when I followed it - http://www.portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/Etec/PT3812/PT3812index.htm) so if you can tell me what im meant to put under 'public port - start', 'public port - end', 'private port', and tell me wheres I can find my computer ip address that will definitely be it, because I tried my default gateway ip address that was under 'start menu, run, commands, ipconfig /all'. and this other gateway ip address didnt work but might be because im typing the wrong thing under the ports. Im using the port 43594, I just typed the port number under all 3 port things.
[b]Just to let you know I dont understand complicated programming language so if you can make it as simple as possible (as some of you call as newbie as possible?)[/b]
[i][b](a link to a good source thats easy to use would be helpful, even if thats all you post)[/b][/i] Ok next I need to know how to use a server source then link it to my domain that I created at - http://www.no-ip.com/. Also want to know how to change the server source I downloaded by giving it my servers name and change the port it uses as I download some server sources and everytime I run it its got the old servers port and name.
Then I'll add anything else if Im having more problems I hope someone can help me soon lol and if you do thanks very much for sparing your time for me.

item.title: Looking for help/tut on getting a server up
item.dc:creator: @driftxt driftxt
item.description:
@driftxt wrote:

Just to let you know I’ve read the ‘ultimate server guide’ twice and tried what he recommended but these are the problems I am having after not finding out how to fix them checking his guide over and over.

Ok a few problems im having, I used - http://ascape.bounceme.net/portcheck.php, to check if my router was set up properly but obviously not so I need help for setting up the port forwarding with a puretek pt-3812 router please (I used this to do it but it didnt work when I followed it - http://www.portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/Etec/PT3812/PT3812index.htm)
so if you can tell me what im meant to put under ‘public port - start’, ‘public port - end’, ‘private port’, and tell me wheres I can find my computer ip address that will definitely be it, because I tried my default gateway ip address that was under ‘start menu, run, commands, ipconfig /all’. and this other gateway ip address didnt work but might be because im typing the wrong thing under the ports. Im using the port 43594, I just typed the port number under all 3 port things.

Just to let you know I dont understand complicated programming language so if you can make it as simple as possible (as some of you call as newbie as possible?)

(a link to a good source thats easy to use would be helpful, even if thats all you post)
Ok next I need to know how to use a server source then link it to my domain that I created at - http://www.no-ip.com/. Also want to know how to change the server source I downloaded by giving it my servers name and change the port it uses as I download some server sources and everytime I run it its got the old servers port and name.

Then I’ll add anything else if Im having more problems I hope someone can help me soon lol and if you do thanks very much for sparing your time for me.

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for help/tut on getting a server up
